subject: Negotiation
title: Setting Your Reservation Price
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Setting Your Reservation Price.

hook.text: Every negotiator needs a number they won't go below â€” the invisible red line.

buildup.text: Your reservation price is the worst deal you'd accept before walking away.

discovery.text: Setting it before the talk protects you from emotional decisions at the table.

twist.text: Set it too high, you miss good deals. Too low, you give away value.

climax.text: Write it on paper before the meeting starts. Don't change it under pressure.

punchline.text: Know your limit before the pressure hits.

quiz.question: What is a reservation price?
options: The worst deal you'd accept before walking away
